sentence: “Racism is an evil that our country has fought against for generations, and we must stand up for the rights of all Americans to receive equal protection under the law,” Reps. Jim Jordan of Ohio, Dan Bishop of North Carolina, Darrell Issa of California and 13 others wrote in a Friday letter to Attorney General Merrick Garland.
author: Steven Nelson
title: Republicans ask DOJ to probe ‘racial discrimination’ against whites in COVID treatment

sentence: “Jim Jordan, my colleagues and I are ready to see this through to the end.” The article goes on to state the following: In the letter, the House Republicans reference a bombshell report from the New York Post published in the weeks leading up to the 2020 presidential election detailing the contents of Hunter Biden’s laptop that suggested he was using his father’s position of power for his own financial gain.
author: DML News App
title: REPORT: House Republicans put Hunter Biden’s legal team on notice over business dealings

sentence: "Jim Jordan, my colleagues and I are ready to see this through to the end."
author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: House Republicans send letter to Hunter Biden law firm seeking preservation of records

sentence: Troy Nehls, a Texas Republican, simply wrote, “Make Twitter Great Again,” while Rep. Jim Jordan praised Musk on Fox, painting him as the embodiment of “free speech.” Last Saturday, Musk rejected an offer from Twitter to join the company’s board—a move that would have barred him from acquiring a Twitter stake greater than 14.9%.
author: Caleb Ecarma
title: Right-Wingers Are Absolutely Eating Up the Idea of Elon Musk Taking Over Twitter
